title: Folding Fan, early 20th century
medium: Medium: silk, tortoise shell, ostrich feathers
creditline: Gift of Simon Lissim in memory of Agnes Howson Waples (Mrs Rufus Waples)
description:
Double leaf: 
Obverse: Painted silk with central initials "IZ": Engagement fan for Irene Zalchopine Lissim from Simon Lissim, (her husband 1924).
Reverse: Plain silk.
Sticks:
Tortoise (imitation?) sticks with ostrich feathers. Note initials on rivet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Folding Fan, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: silk, tortoise shell, ostrich feathers. Gift of Simon Lissim in memory of Agnes Howson Waples (Mrs Rufus Waples). 1973-73-1.
